CocialsDescription: We've coded a custom website for our sister company Cocials.
DBZDescription: We've coded an entire website for the Divide by Zero alliance
HoornhekDescription: Here's one of our successful but simple school projects!
Name: Name
FreePlan: I want a free design before sticking to a plan
ChoosePlan: I want to choose a plan
FillInTheForm: Fill in the form and our Team will get back to you within 24 hours.
ContactQuestions: Got any questions which don't fit the form its purpose? Contact us at:
FreeDesignContent: Our talented team of designers is here to bring your vision to life. Whether you have a specific concept in mind or need guidance from our design experts, we'll collaborate closely with you to create a visually captivating website that reflects your unique brand identity. This design is free and can be requested before ordering one of our plans.
QualityCodeContent: At Codecials, we understand that a website's success lies not only in its design but also in the underlying code that powers it. That's why we go the extra mile to deliver exceptional quality code that is finely tuned for both SEO and performance.
TheTotalPackageContent: Our total package includes everything needed to launch your website, we will take care of the domain, hosting, design and coding of the entire website. This gives you less stress while we can work in our desired development area. We're also able to use your current domain and host if that's preferred.
MaintenanceContent: In our Premium Plus and Ultimate VIP package we offer a continued support which means we will take care of any changes on the website until our CMS system has been released, in our CMS system you will be able to change things like the text and images on the website by yourself. But it will take some time until we've got our custom CMS fully ready to be used for customers so until then we will take care of the changes.
TransformText: Transform your online vision into reality with our developers.
TheseTermsofService: These Terms of Service outline the rules and regulations for the use of Codecials's website and services. By accessing this website and using our services, you agree to comply with these terms. If you disagree with any part of these terms, please do not use our website or services
DaI2: 'Services' refers to all web development, design, and related services offered by Codecials
DaI3: 'Client,' 'you,' and 'your' refer to individuals or entities accessing our website or using our services
DaI4: 'Codecials,' 'we,' 'us,' and 'our' refer to the web development company providing the services
SA1: By engaging our services, you agree to be bound by the terms outlined in any specific service agreement, proposal, or contract provided by Codecials. These documents will govern the scope, deliverables, timelines, and payments related to the project
IP1: All intellectual property rights, including copyrights, trademarks, and other proprietary information related to the services provided by Codecials, remain the sole property of Codecials
IP2: You may not use or reproduce any part of our services without our explicit written consent

CC2: Codecials will not be held liable for any copyright or intellectual property infringement arising from the use of client-provided content
PF1: You agree to pay Codecials the agreed-upon fees for the services provided as per the terms outlined in the service agreement or proposal
PF2: Payment terms, methods, and schedules will be specified in the service agreement or proposal
CY1: Both parties agree to keep confidential information shared during the course of the project and not disclose it to any third parties without prior written consent
T1: Either party may terminate the service agreement if the other party br /eaches any material term and fails to cure such br /each within a reasonable period
T2: Termination will not relieve you of your obligation to pay for the services provided up to the date of termination
LoF1: Codecials will not be liable for any damages, losses, or expenses incurred as a result of using our services, except as provided in the service agreement
LoF2: In no event shall Codecials's total liability exceed the amount paid by you for the specific services that caused the alleged damages
A1: Codecials reserves the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time without prior notice. The updated terms will be posted on our website, and your continued use of our services will constitute your acceptance of the revised terms
GL1: These Terms of Service shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of The Netherlands, without regard to its conflict of law provisions
C1: If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms of Service, please contact us at support@codecials.com
ByUsingOurWebsite: By using our website and engaging our services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to these Terms of Service. Thank you for choosing Codecials for your web development needs
